title: Email Sequence Builder
description: Create multi-touch email sequences for marketing, onboarding, or follow-ups
author: Prompt Forge Pro

fields.label: Sequence Purpose
fields.placeholder: e.g., converting free trial users to paid customers
fields.helpText: What specific outcome should this sequence achieve?

fields.label: Target Audience
fields.placeholder: e.g., SaaS founders, marketing managers at mid-size companies

fields.label: Industry/Context
fields.placeholder: e.g., B2B SaaS, E-commerce, Professional Services

fields.label: Sequence Flow Strategy
fields.placeholder: e.g., Intro → Value → Social Proof → Objection Handling → Close
fields.helpText: Describe the logical progression of your emails

fields.label: Key Messages
fields.placeholder: e.g., Our tool saves 5 hours/week, 94% customer satisfaction, Easy 5-minute setup

fields.label: Value Propositions
fields.placeholder: e.g., Reduce manual work, Increase team productivity, Get insights faster

fields.label: Call-to-Action Progression
fields.placeholder: e.g., Email 1: Download guide → Email 3: Book demo → Email 5: Start trial
fields.helpText: How should CTAs progress through the sequence?

fields.label: Custom Personalization Variables
fields.placeholder: e.g., {{company_name}}, {{industry}}, {{pain_point}}, {{previous_interaction}}
fields.helpText: List merge tags/variables for personalization

fields.label: Brand Voice
fields.placeholder: e.g., Innovative, trustworthy, approachable, expert-level

fields.label: Brand Values
fields.placeholder: e.g., Transparency, customer success, innovation, simplicity
fields.helpText: Key brand values to communicate

fields.label: Offers/Incentives
fields.placeholder: e.g., 30% discount, Free consultation, Extended trial period
fields.helpText: Any special offers to include in the sequence

fields.label: Common Objections
fields.placeholder: e.g., Too expensive, Don't have time to implement, Not sure it works for our industry
fields.helpText: What objections should the sequence address?

title: Cold Outreach Optimizer
description: Generate high-converting cold emails with personalization and A/B testing variations
author: Prompt Forge Pro

fields.label: Recipient Name
fields.placeholder: e.g., Sarah Johnson

fields.label: Recipient Title
fields.placeholder: e.g., VP of Marketing

fields.label: Company Name
fields.placeholder: e.g., TechCorp Inc

fields.label: Industry
fields.placeholder: e.g., B2B SaaS, Healthcare, Manufacturing

fields.label: Recent Company News/Events
fields.placeholder: e.g., Recent funding round, new product launch, expansion, leadership changes
fields.helpText: Any recent developments that could be referenced

fields.label: Personal/Professional Triggers
fields.placeholder: e.g., LinkedIn post about scaling challenges, mentioned in industry article
fields.helpText: Recent activities or mentions that create outreach opportunities

fields.label: Identified Pain Points
fields.placeholder: e.g., Manual reporting processes, lack of real-time data, team communication issues
fields.helpText: Specific challenges your solution addresses

fields.label: Mutual Connections
fields.placeholder: e.g., John Smith (former colleague), Mary Johnson (LinkedIn connection)
fields.helpText: Any shared connections or referral sources

fields.label: Core Value Proposition
fields.placeholder: e.g., Reduce reporting time by 75% while increasing data accuracy

fields.label: Relevant Social Proof
fields.placeholder: e.g., Used by 500+ companies like theirs, 95% customer satisfaction, award winner

fields.label: Credibility Builders
fields.placeholder: e.g., Featured in TechCrunch, SOC2 compliant, 99.9% uptime
fields.helpText: Elements that build trust and credibility

fields.label: Primary Call-to-Action
fields.placeholder: e.g., Book a 15-minute call to discuss your reporting challenges

fields.label: Relevant Case Study
fields.placeholder: e.g., Similar company increased efficiency by 60% in 3 months
fields.helpText: Brief relevant success story

fields.label: Specific Quantified Benefit
fields.placeholder: e.g., Save 10 hours per week, Increase accuracy by 40%, Reduce costs by $50k annually

fields.label: Risk Reversal/Guarantee
fields.placeholder: e.g., No-commitment demo, Money-back guarantee, Free trial period
fields.helpText: Ways to reduce perceived risk

fields.label: Follow-up Strategy
fields.placeholder: e.g., Follow up in 1 week with industry report, Touch base in 2 weeks with case study
fields.helpText: Plan for subsequent outreach if no response

title: Crisis Communication Email
description: Craft sensitive crisis communication emails with empathy and clarity
author: Prompt Forge Pro

fields.label: Affected Parties
fields.placeholder: e.g., All customers, Premium subscribers, Employees, Specific region

fields.label: Crisis Description
fields.placeholder: Brief, factual description of the situation...
fields.helpText: Provide a clear, factual overview

fields.label: What Happened
fields.placeholder: Clear, concise explanation of the incident...
fields.helpText: Factual description without speculation

fields.label: When It Occurred
fields.placeholder: e.g., January 15, 2024 at 2:30 PM EST

fields.label: Root Cause (if known)
fields.placeholder: e.g., System malfunction, Human error, External attack
fields.helpText: Only include if definitively known

fields.label: Immediate Actions Taken
fields.placeholder: e.g., Systems shut down, affected customers notified, investigation launched

fields.label: Ongoing Response Efforts
fields.placeholder: e.g., Working with security experts, implementing additional safeguards

fields.label: Primary Stakeholder Concerns
fields.placeholder: e.g., Data security, service reliability, financial impact
fields.helpText: What are stakeholders most worried about?

fields.label: Support Offered
fields.placeholder: e.g., Credit monitoring, refunds, extended warranties, dedicated support
fields.helpText: What support are you providing to affected parties?

fields.label: Next Steps
fields.placeholder: e.g., Complete investigation within 48 hours, implement new security measures

fields.label: Legal Constraints
fields.placeholder: e.g., Ongoing investigation limits details, regulatory approval needed
fields.helpText: Any legal limitations on what can be communicated

fields.label: Regulatory Requirements
fields.placeholder: e.g., GDPR notification requirements, SEC disclosure rules
fields.helpText: Compliance requirements for communication

fields.label: Update Timeline
fields.placeholder: e.g., Daily updates until resolved, Weekly progress reports
fields.helpText: When will you provide updates?

fields.label: Media Considerations
fields.placeholder: e.g., Media statements prepared, spokesperson designated, press conference planned
fields.helpText: Media handling strategy
